articles.title: Vitamin deficiencies linked to hair loss - IndiaTimes
articles.description: Thinning or falling of hair, or suffering from poor hair quality can be deficiencies of several vitamins which are lacking in our body. Having the required amount and a perfect diet can also lead to good quality hair.
articles.content: If you are dealing with dry hair, split ends, increased shedding, slow growth, brittle hair, and breakage, then you are dealing with vitamin C deficiency. One should include vitamin C-rich foods such… [+235 chars]
